REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Cancer survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After battling cancer for years as a teen, [PAWN_nameDef] has grown accustom to the sight of sickness and death, as well as aware of [PAWN_possessive] own mortality and willingly accept it. Surgery is no different to [PAWN_objective], than someone else brushing their teeth, pain is but an fact of life. Spending years in the hospital has helped, medicine seems to make more sense to [PAWN_objective] than others.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Jack of all trades
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] detested violence when [PAWN_pronoun] grew up, prefering a more civil approach to conflict. [PAWN_pronoun] learned many ways to communicate with people because of this, earning [PAWN_objective] the nickname "The Terminator" both as a joke to [PAWN_possessive] unwillingness to fight and respect for being able to solve any problem.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Junior officer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Junior Officer in [PAWN_possessive] Colonies Colonial Marines. [PAWN_pronoun] is a Lieutenant and has served in various conflicts and political events, earning medals for service. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to lead and turn the tide of conflicts.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medical soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as Medical Support for the Colonial Marines of [PAWN_possessive] Colony. Having medical experience [PAWN_pronoun] is critical to the success of the squads.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary lieutenant
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Lieutenant of [PAWN_possessive] own private force. A good shot with any weapon [PAWN_pronoun] can handle himself, [PAWN_nameDef] can take out any threats and usually works for some quick cash. Well known [PAWN_pronoun] is someone who you will want to watch out for.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military scout
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as Scout for the Colonial Marines of [PAWN_possessive] Colony. A good shot with a rifle and deadly sights, [PAWN_nameDef] can take out any threats before the main forces arrive. [PAWN_pronoun] is also good at hunting.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Musician
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a talented musician who created famous works such as "What Does the Fox Say" and "Elevator Music." Well, sometimes bad things, such as being stranded on a rimworld, happen to good people.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Police officer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Police Officer for the Urban Police Service of Colonial Affairs. Having served for 2 years [PAWN_pronoun] has just been promoted. [PAWN_pronoun] will carry out [PAWN_possessive] duties without hesitation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Police sergeant
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Police Sergeant for the Urban Police Service of Colonial Affairs, having served for several years. Locking up Criminals could never be better.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Politician
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has served [PAWN_possessive] Colonies Government for a full term of Office. [PAWN_pronoun] sure knows how to talk and can inspire people to see things [PAWN_possessive] way.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Professional builder
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a professional construction worker. [PAWN_pronoun] has made [PAWN_possessive] living by erecting buildings of all shapes and sizes. [PAWN_pronoun] has limited skills in aspects, but few can match [PAWN_possessive] proficiency in construction.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Professional farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a professional farmer. [PAWN_pronoun] has made [PAWN_possessive] living by growing the food and commercial products which make the world run. [PAWN_possessive] experience at living on the farm has taught [PAWN_objective] how to handle just about every task vital to survival.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Professional miner
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a professional miner. [PAWN_pronoun] has made [PAWN_possessive] living by busting up rocks and minerals found used in construction and industrial applications throughout the galaxy. Often times, [PAWN_pronoun] has had to repair [PAWN_possessive] own tools while deep in the mine and frequently has to build supports for the mines. So [PAWN_pronoun] has acquired a few skills which pertain to that.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Senior officer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Senior Officer in [PAWN_possessive] Colonies Colonial Marines. [PAWN_pronoun] is a Major and has served for many years, earning countless medals and commendations. [PAWN_pronoun] may have been out of combat for a while but [PAWN_pronoun] can still defend [PAWN_possessive] Colony and lead with style.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Starship bioengineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bioengineer on a starship. [PAWN_pronoun] was quite adept at coming up with new ways to get those plants growing ever so slighty better than the last strain.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Starship cook
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a cook on a starship. [PAWN_pronoun] was very good and ended up spending more time eating [PAWN_possessive] own creations than [PAWN_pronoun] should have.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Starship engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a engineer on a starship. [PAWN_pronoun] always liked fixing things so [PAWN_pronoun] hopped on the first starship [PAWN_pronoun] saw to be their engineer keeping things running "smoothly." [PAWN_pronoun] spends a good amount of time tinkering with things on the ship that [PAWN_pronoun] probably shouldn't be while s are in cryptosleep.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Starship guard
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enrolled to join the galatic military but after an accident with a fellow soldier [PAWN_pronoun] was sent to a base called the "death star" to improve [PAWN_possessive] aim and to keep [PAWN_objective] under surveillance. [PAWN_pronoun] swears [PAWN_possessive] gun simply malfunctioned.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Starship nurse
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a nurse on a starship. [PAWN_pronoun] was a very charismatic nurse with a great bedside manner. After years of caring for battle wounds [PAWN_pronoun] has become a pacifist.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Starship pilot
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a pilot on a starship. [PAWN_pronoun] has very fast reflexes. Chances are if [PAWN_possessive] ship went down [PAWN_pronoun] was not piloting it at the time, or something very bad was chasing it.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Super soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a super soldier created to battle unknown threats in the universe.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Veteran marine
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Veteran Soldier in [PAWN_possessive] Colony's Colonial Marines. [PAWN_pronoun] is a Sergeant Major and has served for many years, earning countless medals for bravery and distingushed service. [PAWN_pronoun] has fought in numerous campaigns and thus knows how to fight and lead in extreme situations.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Video game blogger
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has worked as programmer in big corp. [PAWN_pronoun] has two hobbies: videogaming and videoblogging.
